alert.note: Alert for Allen; Beauregard; Northern Calcasieu; Northern Jefferson Davis; Rapides; Southern Calcasieu; Southern Jefferson Davis; Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 01 at 3:12AM CDT until September 01 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM UNTIL 8 PM FOR CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS ACROSS ALL OF SOUTHEAST TEXAS AND MUCH OF SOUTHWEST AND CENTRAL LOUISIANA... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR LOW HUMIDITY AND VERY DRY FUELS FOR ALL SOUTHEAST TEXAS AND MUCH OF SOUTHWEST LOUISIANA... * AFFECTED AREA...Vernon, Rapides, Beauregard, Allen, Northern Calcasieu, Northern Jefferson Davis, Tyler, Hardin, Southern Calcasieu, Southern Jefferson Davis, Northern Jasper, Northern Newton, Southern Jasper, Southern Newton, Upper Jefferson, Northern Orange, Lower Jefferson and Southern Orange. * TIMING...10 AM until 8 PM CDT. * WINDS...Northeast 5 to 10 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 20 percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the upper 90s to around 100 degrees. * LIGHTNING...None. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Burn bans are in effect across Louisiana and Southeast Texas.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Beauregard; Northern Calcasieu; Northern Jefferson Davis; Rapides; Southern Calcasieu; Southern Jefferson Davis; Vernon
